Package com.csse3200.game.components.maingame

Class DialogueAudioManager

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.maingame.DialogueAudioManager
public class DialogueAudioManager extends Object
对话音频管理器 负责预加载、播放和停止对话音频
